title: Bug 113047 - No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, no children node listing is displayed. The issue persists even after closing and reopening the data set editor.
EB: Expect the data set editor to display the children node listing when changing the data source for a data set in the query tab.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.
2. Open the data set editor and navigate to the data source page.
3. Change the data source to one that has no database/table/column information.

Actual result: No children node listing is displayed when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab. The issue persists even after closing and reopening the data set editor.
